question: Identify a year in which {city} experienced the cleanest air from 2018-{year}
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[main_data["city"] == "{code_city}"]
    data = data[(data["Timestamp"].dt.year >= 2018) & (data["Timestamp"].dt.year <= {code_year})]
    data = data.dropna(subset="PM2.5")
    data = data.groupby(data["Timestamp"].dt.year)["PM2.5"].mean().reset_index()
    data = data.sort_values(by="PM2.5")
    print(data.iloc[0]["Timestamp"])


true_code()
